_description: The lament of a nun in love with a priest, in a Latin treatise Si vis ad vitam ingredi, serva mandata — one couplet

CULIi38.Transcription:
Synne is on my bresteÞat non so bitter loue is as of
                    prest

Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 3.
